name: Bloomer Inc.
description: Developer of an online dating application designed to connect lesbian, bisexual and bi-curious women. The company's application operates a social hub where lesbians can find, meet and date like-minded people by directly sending messages, emojis and pictures, enabling users to make new friends and meet the right person as per their preference.
one_liner: Developer of an online dating application designed to connect lesbian, bisexual and bi-curious women. The company's application operates a social hub where lesbians can find, meet and date like-minded people by directly sending messages, emojis and pictures, enabling users to make new friends and meet the right person as per their preference.
